title: Toggle Component Contract
description: Contract extracted from Figma Untitled UI Toggle component. This defines all required properties that the LIT component must implement.

source.notes: Extracted via Figma Desktop MCP get_design_context + get_metadata + get_variable_defs

size.notes: Size determines toggle track and knob dimensions, plus typography scale when text is present

pressed.description: Whether the toggle is pressed (on/off state)
pressed.notes: Controls on/off state. Visual: knob slides to right when true, track color changes to Brand/600

state.notes: State is typically managed via CSS pseudo-classes (:hover, :focus-visible) and disabled attribute, not as a component property

text.description: Whether to show the label text
text.notes: In Figma, boolean prop to show/hide label. In code, label is provided via slot content or string property

supportingText.description: Whether to show supporting/helper text below the label
supportingText.notes: In Figma, boolean prop. In code, can be implemented as separate slot or property. Only visible when text is also true

notes: All Figma component properties must have corresponding LIT component @property decorators
State management should use CSS pseudo-classes for hover/focus, not component properties
Additional web-specific props (name, value, ariaLabel) are acceptable and not in Figma
text and supportingText in Figma are booleans; in code they are slots or string properties
Knob position: left (off) or right (on) - achieved via justify-start/justify-end on flex container
Disabled+pressed: track reverts to Gray/100 but knob stays on right side
All property values extracted from Figma design context
Design tokens documented and verified across all states
Typography specifications confirmed for both sizes
Component structure analyzed: track (flex container) + knob (circle with shadow)
48 total variants in Figma (2 pressed × 2 sizes × 2 text × 2 supporting × 4 states, minus combos)
